name: codio-aws-marketplace-landing-pages
description: Production landing page system for Codio's AWS Marketplace offerings

scripts.deploy:pages: npm run generate && npm run upload && npm run invalidate
scripts.upload: aws s3 cp ai-labs-index.html s3://ai-labs-web-930e7cc0/index.html && aws s3 cp aws-labs-index.html s3://aws-labs-web-796a80b0/index.html && aws s3 cp cloud-labs-index.html s3://cloud-labs-web-68b3f5c0/index.html
scripts.invalidate: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E7K8B2EHD7P3U --paths '/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3L0YJ3DS46XHU --paths '/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E13IJ9NI8XJ7T5 --paths '/*'

author: Codio
